name: Golf Numeric
description:
This is a golf style game where you find a hole with hints of numbers.

Blue squares indicate the current position.
Numbers indicate the number of steps to the hole.
For example, "1" is one next to the top, bottom, left, or right.
For example, "2" is the next to the next, up, down, left, or right. Or it is either upper right, upper left, lower right or lower left.

Tap to the position you want to advance will be 1 stroke.
You can move within 3 steps with a single shot.

In later halls, ponds and forests appear.
You can not go to the pond or the forest.
You can jump over the pond, but the forest must be avoided by detouring.
